category.name: Configuration.Reports
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Crf_report_pff_map
preference.preference_description: Stores the report builder reports ID/PFF (Property Finder Formatter) name pair. Values are in the format "<report_ID><Delimiter><PFF_name>" (e.g. "TC_9_00_SUM_RPT_0003#ItemOwnership"). The delimiter is defined by the preference "Crf_report_pff_delimit".
